page.title: 14A Day in the life of a wife
page.content: At 6.55 a.m. Mrs Mcauley gets up and gets dressed.She then has her breakfast, a bowl of cereal, and then wakes up her sons.Then she prepares their breakfast and takes them to school.After she drops off her children, she returns home and generally cleans the house with a vacuum cleane.Round about midday she visits a friend or a friend visits her.She then has a snack lunch. In the afternoon she goes shopping in Shelford.At 3.30 p.m. she goes to collect her sons from school.When she gets home she starts to prepare supper.At 6.00 p.m. she watches the news.At 7.00 p.m. she serves the supper and leaves the washing up for later.Then she does the ironing. At about 8.30 p.m. she does the washing up.She then sits down and watches T.V.At 10.30 she goes to bed.
